tool_description: chucknorris.io is a free JSON API for hand curated Chuck Norris facts.
name: Chuck Norris
title: Chuck Norris

api_list.name: /jokes/random
api_list.description: Retrieve a random chuck joke in JSON format.

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description: Specifies the category of the random joke.

api_list.name: /jokes/categories
api_list.description: Retrieve a list of available joke categories.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://matchilling-chuck-norris-jokes-v1.p.rapidapi.com/jokes/categories"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "matchilling-chuck-norris-jokes-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://matchilling-chuck-norris-jokes-v1.p.rapidapi.com/jokes/categories"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "matchilling-chuck-norris-jokes-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /jokes/search
